  • Method Details

    • loadSecondFxml

      public void loadSecondFxml(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Handles the login process and loads the MainPage.fxml if the login is successful. If the login fails, it displays the login error message.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent triggered by a button press or other user interaction
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output exception occurs during the loading of FXML
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during the process

    • registerPage

      public void registerPage(javafx.event.Event event) throws IOException
      Handles the action of navigating to the registration page by loading the RegisterPage.fxml layout. Sets the current stage's scene root to the registration page and adjusts window properties.
      Parameters:
      event - the Event triggered by user interaction, such as a button press
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during the loading of the FXML file
